import React from "react"; import { TrendingUpIcon, UsersIcon, TerminalIcon, CalculatorIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; // I'd like to eventually put some indicative trading things on this page, think historical returns etc. const features = [ { name: 'Developer Data', description: "There's no better indication if a protocol is being pushed forward. Track all notable changes automatically", icon: TerminalIcon, }, { name: 'Examine Social Data', description: "wouldn't it be great to know about the next hot project before it jumps? Monitoring social activity lets you do exactly that.", icon: UsersIcon, }, { name: 'Statistical Analysis', description: "No more spreadsheets, =mean(), or pivot tables. Our platform's baked-in statistical analysis gives you all the information with none of the work.", icon: CalculatorIcon, }, { name: 'Top Movers', description: "Stop wasting time looking for daily top movers. See them front and center on our dashboard.", icon: TrendingUpIcon, }, ] const metrics = [ { id: 1, stat: '2+', emphasis: 'People', rest: 'Using this dashboard' }, { id: 2, stat: '1+', emphasis: 'Countries', rest: '' }, { id: 3, stat: '98%', emphasis: 'Customer satisfaction', rest: 'As measured by one internal survey' }, { id: 4, stat: '1M+', emphasis: 'Issues resolved', rest: 'While this might not be true, it certainly feels true.' }, ] const footerNavigation = { solutions: [ { name: 'Marketing', href: '#' }, { name: 'Analytics', href: '#' }, { name: 'Commerce', href: '#' }, { name: 'Insights', href: '#' }, ], support: [ { name: 'Pricing', href: '#' }, { name: 'Documentation', href: '#' }, { name: 'Guides', href: '#' }, { name: 'API Status', href: '#' }, ], company: [ { name: 'About', href: '#' }, { name: 'Blog', href: '#' }, { name: 'Jobs', href: '#' }, { name: 'Press', href: '#' }, { name: 'Partners', href: '#' }, ], legal: [ { name: 'Claim', href: '#' }, { name: 'Privacy', href: '#' }, { name: 'Terms', href: '#' }, ], social: [ { name: 'Facebook', href: '#', icon: (props) => ( ), }, { name: 'Instagram', href: '#', icon: (props) => ( ), }, { name: 'Twitter', href: '#', icon: (props) => ( ), }, { name: 'GitHub', href: '#', icon: (props) => ( ), }, ], } function ProductHome({setHome,home}) { function handleClickHome(e){ // e.preventDefault() setHome(!home); } return(
{/* Hero section */}

This is Not Your Dad's Market

Blockchain technology is here to stay, but the market is volatile. Without cross validated informational alpha, uninformed traders remain vulnerable to price swings.

{/* Get started */} Show me what that means
{/* social proof of madeup co's*/}

Believe it or not, we're already trusted by over 5 made up very average small businesses

{/* Gradient Feature Section */}

Automate Your Data Analytics

In a market that is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and every major holiday - you can't afford to sleep. Our dashboard saves hours of analysis so you don't forget how comfortable your bed is.

{features.map((feature) => (

{feature.name}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Stats section */}

Undeniable Metrics

Good Data leads to Good trades.

The best trader in the world will lose money working with bad data, you simply cannot afford to be uninformed. We have consolidated and cross-validated data from different providers to deliver a one-stop Data solution. See what our dashboard can do for free.

{metrics.map((item) => (

{item.stat} {item.emphasis} {item.rest}

))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to get started? Then click the button already.

"The Button" {/* See if you can make these buttons swap places on hover */}

Footer

Subscribe for Updates

We *will* resell your information. Nothing in life is free.

{/* CONFIGURE THIS FORM INPUT. */}
{/*
*/} {/* Configure the social links so they work. */}
{footerNavigation.social.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}

© 2021 Fairly II, Inc. All rights reserved.

) } export default ProductHome;
